name: Gauge Meter Slider
author: diegpl, pkelbert

sections.description:
Gauge Meter with Slider, made with jQuery

Our sites:
http://userdev.com.br

http://wpsoftwares.com

http://wpsoft.com.br

Arbitrary section

Markdown

  1. Give your clients much more information. Numbers are the truth!
sections.installation:
1. Open plugins/gauge-meter-slider/gauge-meter-slider.js
  2. Update it with the values you want. Documentation: http://www.jqwidgets.com/jquery-widgets-demo/demos/jqxgauge/index.htm?(arctic)#demos/jqxgauge/gauge-value.htm
  3. Upload it to plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/)
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Use [gaugemeter] shortcode to bring it
sections.faq:
What is missing on this plugin?

Integration in the back-end with a data-base
If you want more than one gauge meter appearing in your site you should work over the code, it is not difficult, if you want it just ask me about.
A much better gauge meter with slider is this: http://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/dataviz/radialgauge – It has a way to work with decimal values
